name: top-trader-ls-account-ratio
description: Fetches long/short account ratio for top traders (top 20% by margin balance) from Binance futures. This metric shows how large, sophisticated traders are positioning themselves. Output includes: long/short account ratio, percentage of top trader accounts with long positions, and percentage with short positions. Top traders are considered 'smart money' - their positioning often signals market direction. A ratio > 1 indicates top traders are net long, while < 1 indicates net short positioning.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve (max 500)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since epoch
